## Namespaces Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="namespace"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a></>}>
This is an optimization pass for GlobalISel generic memory operations. <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerpass">RegisterPass&lt;passName&gt;</a></>}>
RegisterPass&lt;t&gt; template - This template class is used to notify the system that a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> is available for use, and registers it into the internal database maintained by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passmanager">PassManager</a>. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerpass/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passregistrationlistener">PassRegistrationListener</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passregistrationlistener">PassRegistrationListener</a> class - This class is meant to be derived from by clients that are interested in which passes get registered and unregistered at runtime (which can be because of the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerpass">RegisterPass</a> constructors being run as the program starts up, or may be because a shared object just got loaded). <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passregistrationlistener/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">/// RegisterPass&lt;t&gt; template - This template class is used to notify the system</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that a Pass is available for use, and registers it into the internal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">/// database maintained by the PassManager.  Unless this template is used, opt,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for example will not be able to see the pass and attempts to create the pass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">/// will fail. This template is used in the follow manner (at global scope, in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">/// your .cpp file):</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">/// static RegisterPass&lt;YourPassClassName&gt; tmp(&quot;passopt&quot;, &quot;My Pass Name&quot;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This statement will cause your pass to be created by calling the default</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">/// constructor exposed by the pass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerpass"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> passName&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerpass/#aee30bf48a272c4267cd3606e047aa3e8">RegisterPass</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinfo/#a9120a17cdcf88826fb07b59bc7db1b20">PassInfo</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Register Pass using default constructor...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerpass/#aee30bf48a272c4267cd3606e047aa3e8"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerpass/#aee30bf48a272c4267cd3606e047aa3e8">RegisterPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> PassArg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinecfgprinter-cpp/#af50584ae7dcdfb215af187e3e0ea8680">CFGOnly</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> is&#95;analysis = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinfo/#a9120a17cdcf88826fb07b59bc7db1b20">PassInfo</a>(Name, PassArg, &amp;passName::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">/// PassRegistrationListener class - This class is meant to be derived from by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">/// clients that are interested in which passes get registered and unregistered</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">/// at runtime (which can be because of the RegisterPass constructors being run</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">/// as the program starts up, or may be because a shared object just got</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loaded).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
